message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you that I think you'll really value. I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $85.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a bit more to make this work for me. I'm willing to come down to $95.  Let me know what you think!
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $90 for the product.
